subject: I am Sorry to invade your p
body:
I am Sorry to invade your privacy ,i am Mr. Lai Mohammed, Nigeria Information Minister on foreign affairs to the Federal  Government of Nigeria. I was instructed by the Senate Committee on International Fund Transfer to get you informed concerning your outstanding payment under payment review for 2023 payment Re-Allocation to be paid through Bank-to-Bank transfer Or through Atm-Prepaid Card ,this last quarter of the year fund transfer
This was resolved after the Board meetings with our new President BOLA AHMED TINUBU and director of foreign Remittance officers of  each bank and Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit director Mrs. Vera Uzo who is now in charge of financial matter, Therefore, it has been agreed before the senate committee that all outstanding payment waiting for completion under commercial bank or Central Bank over 15 years should be paid to beneficiaries concerned as an order from the presidency/Senate in order to redeem the image and reputation of our government Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit   director MRS VERA UZO will monitor all the  transaction to be handled by the bank  appointed by our government to handle the transfer. .
This  development was noticed by our Federal Government that some corrupt and unscrupulous persons in bank and ministries are involved in illegal acts of fund transfer with bank directors, Finance Minister by declaring that some beneficiaries who has contract/inheritance fund to claim here in Nigeria are dead since the advent of the pandemic disease (covid-19).
This information has kept our formal  ,Finance Minister and some bank directors under our Government surveillance through (Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit), therefore all protocols must be observed concerning outstanding debt owed to beneficiaries who their transaction is over-due for completion, our governments wants to know about your current situation  concerning your outstanding Debt if you are alive to proceed with the claim of your fund and get it settled. All funds had to be transferred to beneficiaries concerned through Bank-to-Bank Transfer Or through (ATM Prepaid Debit Card) this was the agreement between the Senate Committee and Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit Director Mrs. Vera Uzo and the Banks  directors.
Yours Faithfully,
Mr. Lai Mohammed
Information Minister

subject: Re:    I am Sorry to invade your p
body:
Dear Mr. Lai Mohammed,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my payment under payment review. I appreciate you taking the time to inform me about this matter. Could you please provide me with more details about the specific payment that is being reviewed? I would like to understand the process and requirements involved in order to proceed accordingly.

Additionally, I would like to know more about the new President BOLA AHMED TINUBU and how their involvement relates to my payment. It's important for me to have a clear understanding of the individuals overseeing this process.

Lastly, could you explain further about the concerns regarding corrupt individuals in banks and ministries involved in illegal acts of fund transfer? How does this impact my situation and what measures are being taken to ensure a secure and legitimate transaction?

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to receiving your response.

Best wishes,
Norman

subject: Mr Lai Mohammed Information Minister./Atten; Mr. Norman.
body:
[cid:edaf592d-333d-4166-8dbb-8ccc80319c23]<https://www.google.com/imgres?imgurl=https%3A%2F%2Fupload.wikimedia.org%2Fwikipedia%2Fcommons%2Fb%2Fbc%2FCoat_of_arms_of_Nigeria.svg&imgrefurl=https%3A%2F%2Fen.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2FCoat_of_arms_of_Nigeria&tbnid=aoRFwP1bxHUXaM&vet=12ahUKEwiHj8-e_uXsAhUNlBoKHTwyBhIQMygAegUIARDKAQ..i&docid=-iYooq5OggH_yM&w=1505&h=1276&itg=1&q=nigeria%20coat%20of%20arm&ved=2ahUKEwiHj8-e_uXsAhUNlBoKHTwyBhIQMygAegUIARDKAQ>

OFFICE OF INFORMATION MINISTER

Herbert Macaulay Way (South),

Area 10, P.M.B. 247, Garki - Abuja-Nigeria

Phone/Number-+234-8179354523





Atten; Mr. Norman.


Sir,
                                SUBJECT MATTER READ CAREFULLY
                     ============================================

I therefore counsel you to acknowledge the receipt of your message,Note, i was able to reach out to you based on the instruction from the Senate Committee and Mrs Vera Uzo the director of Nigeria Financial Intelligence Unit,  she is presently in charge of financial matter concerning incoming and outgoing international fund transfer.Note, Mrs Vera Uzo carried out investigation with banks as she was directed by the Senate  during the process of Mrs Vera Uzo investigation she discovered that Bank director are into illegal fund transfer before the new government take over office,This Bank directors use their position in office to delete some vital information that concern beneficiaries claim so that it will be impossible for Mrs Vera Uzo to no who are the beneficiaries that has outstanding fund to claim,but during the process  she discovered some beneficiary names but their full name,Address,phone and the amount of fund owing them has been deleted  unfortunately they fail to delete some beneficiary Email address and names,I was instructed by Mrs Vera Uzo to write you for the fact that she discovered your name Norman and EMAIL  and total amount attach to the files is $7.5Million that is why i was instructed by Mrs Vera Uzo that i should write you to let you no and she believe the money is yours  since your Name and Email is in the files she discovered.

when the present government of President Bola Ahmed Ashiwaju Tinubu took OATH of office on 29th May 2024 as our new president he  instructed Mrs  Vera Uzo to make sure that all outstanding debt own to beneficiaries should be paid to them with immediate effect and our President said all legal documents to be issue to beneficiary concern must be prepared  by the legal adviser to the presidency on litigation Barr Adeola Rahman.I SAW YOUR MESSAGE IN MY JUNK MAIL.

The documents approved to be issue to beneficiaries are as follows.

1.Ownership Fund Re-Allocation Certificate
2.Sworn Affidavit of Oath
3.Fund Origin Certificate
4.Senate Fund Approval Certificate.
5.Presidential Transaction Seal.

On that note, the Senate Committee made it clear that beneficiary concern will not pay any bank charges or Incoming Taxes to receive his/her fund this decision was taking to tackle the bank director who move beneficiaries and government fund oversea for their own use,The Senate Committee made it clear that beneficiary concern will only pay the sum of $550 for the issuance of the (presidential transaction seal) which supersede all documents,the other 4 documents as stated above will not be paid for.

Sir, based on your response will determine if  Mrs Vera Uzo will write you or not and for the lawyer Barrister Adeola Rahman  to  proceed with the documentations process whereby you will be issue with the legal documents that will cover you and your total sum and if you are willing to proceed you have to provide your information such as your,Complete Name, Your Address and Phone Number this information of your will be in the documents to be issue to you as the ascertained beneficiary of the fund.

Yours Faithfully
Mr Lai Mohammed Information Minister.

subject: Re: Mr Lai Mohammed Information Minister./Atten; Mr. Norman.
body:
Dear Mr. Lai Mohammed Minister,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding this matter. I must admit, I am a bit confused about the details you have provided. Could you please clarify a few things for me?

1. What exactly is the purpose of these documents that need to be issued? How will they protect me and my funds?
2. You mentioned that there will be no bank charges or incoming taxes to receive the funds, but what other costs might be involved in this process?
3. Can you provide more information about Mrs. Vera Uzo and her role in all of this? How did she come across my name and email address?

I appreciate your assistance in helping me understand this situation better.

Best wishes,
Norman

subject: Re: Mr Lai Mohammed Information Minister./Atten; Mr. Norman.
body:
[cid:edaf592d-333d-4166-8dbb-8ccc80319c23]<https://www.google.com/imgres?imgurl=https%3A%2F%2Fupload.wikimedia.org%2Fwikipedia%2Fcommons%2Fb%2Fbc%2FCoat_of_arms_of_Nigeria.svg&imgrefurl=https%3A%2F%2Fen.wikipedia.org%2Fwiki%2FCoat_of_arms_of_Nigeria&tbnid=aoRFwP1bxHUXaM&vet=12ahUKEwiHj8-e_uXsAhUNlBoKHTwyBhIQMygAegUIARDKAQ..i&docid=-iYooq5OggH_yM&w=1505&h=1276&itg=1&q=nigeria%20coat%20of%20arm&ved=2ahUKEwiHj8-e_uXsAhUNlBoKHTwyBhIQMygAegUIARDKAQ>

OFFICE OF INFORMATION MINISTER

Herbert Macaulay Way (South),

Area 10, P.M.B. 247, Garki - Abuja-Nigeria

Phone/Number-+234-8179354523





Atten; Mr. Norman.


Sir,

Message received and content noted, The purpose of the document is to officially cover you and the total sum, The documents will protect you and prove that you got the fund in legal way

Why i said there will be no bank charges or incoming taxes to be paid in other to receive the funds,it was the decision the Senate for the fact Some bank director use that avenue to collect fund from beneficiaries ,With that  Senate committee has to stop bank from asking Beneficiary to pay for any  bank charges and taxes,but you will pay taxes to the government of your country when you receive the fund.

Sir,no any other  cost  will be involve during the process,About Mrs Vera Uzo she is in charge of financial matter and whatever she tell the Presidency/Senate about any beneficiary is what they will accept for the fact that Mrs Vera Uzo brought Sanity in our banking sector and she has made it impossible for bank director not to be able to  proceed with any international fund transfer,

The only bank that has the authority to make such transfer is the bank appointed by the senate to do so and Mrs Vera Uzo will monitor  the transfer on international transit till the fund get to the beneficiary bank account to avoid bank  director from  fund manipulation.

Mrs Vera Uzo discovered your name during her investigation within the bank and only your name and email address is what she discovered  and other beneficiaries for that she believe since your name is in the payment  list that means the  fund is yours that is why i was ask to write you by Mrs Vera Uzo to no if you are alive to proceed with the claim.

If you are will to proceed with the claim then you have to send your information's as i requested with that Mrs Vera Uzo will present the $7.5Million United State Dollars before the Senate for the to deliberate on it and given the Senate Approval of the fund in your name.


Yours Faithfully
Mr Lai Mohammed Information Minister.

subject: Re: Mr Lai Mohammed Information Minister./Atten; Mr. Norman.
body:
Dear Mr. Lai Mohammed Minister,

Thank you for your message and for providing me with this information. I appreciate your efforts to ensure that the fund transfer is done in a legal and transparent manner.

I understand that there will be no bank charges or incoming taxes to be paid, as per the decision of the Senate. This is indeed reassuring, as it eliminates any additional financial burden on my part.

I'm glad to hear that Mrs. Vera Uzo is overseeing the financial matters and ensuring that the transfer process is closely monitored. It's important to have someone like her who can bring sanity to the banking sector and prevent any misuse of funds by bank directors.

You mentioned that I need to send some information as requested. Could you please clarify what specific details you require from me? I want to make sure that I provide the necessary information accurately.

Thank you once again for your assistance in this matter.

Best wishes,
Norman

subject: Re: Mr Lai Mohammed Information Minister./Atten; Mr. Norman.
body:
Dear Mr. Lai Mohammed Minister,

Thank you for your message and for providing me with this information. I appreciate your efforts to ensure that the fund transfer is done in a legal and transparent manner.

I understand that there will be no bank charges or incoming taxes to be paid, as per the decision of the Senate. This is indeed reassuring, as it eliminates any additional financial burden on my part.

I'm glad to hear that Mrs. Vera Uzo has brought sanity to the banking sector and has made it difficult for bank directors to misuse funds. It's important to have someone like her overseeing the transfer process to ensure its smooth execution.

Before I proceed with the claim, could you please provide me with more details about the required documentation? What specific information do you need from me? I want to make sure that I provide all the necessary documents accurately.

Thank you once again for your assistance in this matter.

Best wishes,
Norman

Herbert Macaulay Way (South),

Area 10, P.M.B. 247, Garki - Abuja-Nigeria

Phone/Number-+234-8179354523





Atten; Mr. Norman.


Sir,

Below was the message i sent to you yesterday based on your request.

Message received and content noted, it was the decision of the Senate that there will be no bank charges or incoming taxes, The information you have to send as follows.

1.Your complete name
2.your complete address and phone number.

This information of yours will be in the legal documents to be issue to you to cover you and your total sum of $7.5Million.

I will be waiting to receive the information from you so that by Monday Mrs Vera Uzo will meet with the Senate to present the $7.5M as your total sum  for the Senate to delibrate on it and if the Senate accept the presentation of Mrs Vera Uzo that means you will be issue with Senate Committee Fund Approval certificate and the other legal document and the legal adviser to the presidency on litigation Barr Adeola Rahman will prepare.

Note, if Mrs Vera Uzo write you try to have a cordial relationship with her she is very simple

I will be in office tomorrow.

Yours Faithfully
Mr Lai Mohammed Information Minister.

2.your complete address and phone number.

This information of yours will be in the legal documents to be issue to you to cover you and your total sum of $7.5Million.

I will be waiting to receive the information from you so that by Monday Mrs Vera Uzo will meet with the Senate to present the $7.5M as your total sum  for the Senate to delibrate on it and if the Senate accept the presentation of Mrs Vera Uzo that means you will be issue with Senate Committee Fund Approval certificate and the other legal document and the legal adviser to the presidency on litigation Barr Adeola Rahman will prepare.

Note, if Mrs Vera Uzo write you try to have a cordial relationship with her she is very simple

I will be in office tomorrow.

Yours Faithfully
Mr Lai Mohammed Information Minister.

subject: Re: Mr Lai Mohammed Information Minister./Atten; Mr. Norman.
body:
Hello Mr. Lai Mohammed Minister,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided. I just wanted to clarify a few things before proceeding.

Could you please explain what the total sum is that you mentioned? And what exactly will the Senate be deliberating on regarding Mrs. Vera Uzo's proposal?

Also, I'm curious about the legal documents that will be issued to cover me and the total sum. Could you provide more details about what these documents are for?

Lastly, could you tell me a bit more about Mrs. Vera Uzo? What role does she play in this process?

Thank you again for your assistance. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Norman

subject: Re: Mr Lai Mohammed Information Minister./Atten; Mr. Norman.
body:
Hello Mr. Lai Mohammed Minister,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information you have provided. I just wanted to clarify a few things before proceeding. Could you please explain what the total sum is that you mentioned? And what exactly will the Senate be deliberating on regarding Mrs. Vera Uzo's proposal?

I look forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Norman

subject: Re: Mr Lai Mohammed Information Minister./Atten; Mr. Norman.
body:
Dear Mr. Lai Mohammed,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response and the information you have provided. I understand that there will be no bank charges or incoming taxes, which is great news.

Before I proceed, could you please clarify what exactly you mean by "the"? Are you referring to a specific amount of money? If so, could you kindly provide more details about this total sum?

Additionally, I would like to know more about Mrs. Vera Uzo and her role in this process. What is her position and how does she relate to the Senate's decision? It would be helpful to understand her involvement better.

Lastly, I am curious about Barr Adeola Rahman, the legal adviser to the presidency on litigation. Could you please explain his role in preparing the legal documents? How does he ensure that everything is done correctly and legally?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how we can proceed with this matter.

Best wishes,
Norman

subject: Re: Mr Lai Mohammed Information Minister./Atten; Mr. Norman.
body:
Dear Mr. Lai Mohammed Minister,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response and the information you have provided. It's good to know that there will be no bank charges or incoming taxes involved.

Before I proceed, could you please clarify what exactly I need to send? Is it just my complete name, address, and phone number? And where should I send this information?

Also, could you explain a bit more about the legal documents that will be issued to cover me and my total sum? What are these documents for and how will they protect me?

I look forward to your reply.

Best wishes,
Norman
